item.description: Please remember to bring bags for clean up and water for the dogs. Also, a small donation would be welcome to cover the cost of maintaining this website.
item.how_to_find_us: From Newburyport Center follow Water Street to Plumb Island Turnpike. Follow Tpk to the end. Take Left on Northern Blvd. Follow to the end. There is a parking lot on the right. We will meet there and then walk down to the beach.
item.why:
Happy Birthday Andrew!
This is the last weekend that dogs will be allowed to romp on the beach. So, let's let them enjoy it!

group.name: Shiba Inu Meet Up of Eastern MA & Southern NH

item.name: May 7th Meet Up
